blocks.data:
Returns the customer settings per channel.

**Notes**

 * `null` indicates that there is no override per given channel and values are inherited from the global level.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Customers | modify | `store_v2_customers` |
|  Customers | read-only | `store_v2_customers_read_only` |
| Stored Payment Instruments| modify | `store_stored_payment_instruments`|
| Stored Payment Instruments| read-only | `store_stored_payment_instruments_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header
Customer settings for this channel are returned.

ask_shopper_for_tracking_consent.description: Determines if a customer requires consent for tracking privacy

policy_url.description: The URL for a website's privacy policy

customer_group_settings.description: The settings for a collection of customers

guest_customer_group_id.description: The ID for a guest customer group

default_customer_group_id.description: The ID for a default customer group

allow_global_logins.description:
* Determines if a channel allows global customer to login
* Determines if customers created on this channel will get global access/login
